name: generate_image
description: Use Zhipu BigModel API to generate an image from a prompt with custom size.

prompt.description: Text description of the image to generate (can be in Chinese or English).

size.description: Image size in 'widthxheight' format. Recommended values: '1024x1024' (default), '768x1344', '864x1152', '1344x768', '1152x864', '1440x720', '720x1440'. Custom size must be 512â€“2048px, divisible by 16, and <= 2^21 pixels total.

output_path.description: Optional. Local path to save the generated image (e.g., './generated_images/image.png'). If not provided, a timestamped file will be created.
